metadata.description: A foreboding, massive tunnel carved into the living rock, its entrance a maw-like void that seems to draw in all light.

atmosphere.lighting: Pitch-black darkness, illuminated only by eerie, bioluminescent fungi
atmosphere.sounds: Echoing groans, distant screams, and the sound of reality tearing apart
atmosphere.scents: Moldy earth, decay, and an otherworldly presence

metadata.significance: A hidden conduit for an ancient, eldritch power that threatens to consume El Doria whole.
